name: Wendigo
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Aura Of Starvation
text: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the wendigo must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed by gnawing cold and crippling hunger for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the wendigo's Aura of Starvation for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The wendigo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The wendigo makes three attacks. two with its icy claw and one with its bite. Alternatively, it uses its Frozen Spittle twice.

action.name: Icy Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage and 14 (4d6) cold damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Frozen Spittle
text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 100 ft., one target. 28 (8d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn.
